entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
